title: 109_s2815
content: Commission on Economic Indicators Act of 2006 - Establishes the Commission on Economic Indicators to study and report to Congress on: (1) economic statistics collected and reported by US government agencies, including national income, employment and unemployment, wages, personal income, wealth, savings, debt, productivity, inflation, and international trade and capital flows. And (2) ways to improve the related statistical measurements so that they provide a more accurate and complete depiction of economic conditions.
